title: Kelly Hayes: the double standards of conservatism (i.e. “there must be in-groups...
content: Kelly Hayes: the double standards of conservatism (i.e. “there must be in-groups whom the law protects but does not bind…”) are about hierarchy (or caste, if you will). “They are outlining the world they want, including who should be victimized at will.”
author: Jason Kottke
